gov.ornl.keva.node

Class SSTableService

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ornl.seda.SEDAService
      • gov.ornl.keva.node.SSTableService

  • public class SSTableService
extends gov.ornl.seda.SEDAService
    SSTable service performs all the work of creating and maintaining sstables. This class is a singleton, which means that only one service will be instantiated for multiple databases.
    Author:
    James Horey

      • addDB

        public void addDB(KevaDB db,
         java.lang.String tableClass,
         java.lang.String jar)
        Add a new sstable implementation.
        Parameters:
        db - The database being added
        tableClass - Name of the sstable class used by this database
        jar - Name of the jar file containing the sstable implementation

                    java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
        Flush the data into the merge buffer.

      • lockForRead

        public void lockForRead()
        Lock reading the sstables. There may be multiple concurrent readers, but only a single writer.

      • unlockForRead

        public void unlockForRead()
        Unlock reading the sstables. There may be multiple concurrent readers, but only a single writer.

      • lockForWrite

        public void lockForWrite()
        Lock writing the sstables. There may be multiple concurrent readers, but only a single writer.

      • unlockForWrite

        public void unlockForWrite()
        Unlock writing the sstables. There may be multiple concurrent readers, but only a single writer.

      • getDataManifests

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getDataManifests(KevaDB db,
                                                                 int startLevel,
                                                                 int maxLevel)
        Get the list of sstables.
        Parameters:
        db - The database we are searching
        startLevel - Start looking at this level
        maxLevel - Stop looking at this level
        Returns:
        Manifest mapping the name of the sstable block to the level at which the sstable is found.

      • getSSTable

        public SSTable getSSTable(KevaDB db,
                 java.lang.String uuid,
                 int level)
        Retrieve the SSTable associated with the path.
        Parameters:
        db - The database we are searching
        uuid - The block ID of the sstable
        level - The level to search for the sstables
        Returns:
        SSTable identified by the parameters

      • hasOlderSSTable

        public boolean hasOlderSSTable(KevaDB db,
                      long time)
        Indicate whether any sstables that are older than or equal to the the time supplied. This is useful when replaying the write-ahead log so that we don't replay commands already in some sstables.
        Parameters:
        db - The database we are searching
        time - The modification time
        Returns:
        Indicate whether any sstable matches the parameter
